title: Friends.Complete.Series.S01-S10.720p.BluRay.2CH.x265.HEVC-PSA
description:
Friends.Complete.Series.720p.BluRay.2CH.x265.HEVC-PSA

WARNING!
Read this carefully if you want to successfully play this release.

Getting this release ready, took hundreds of hours from me. so before you disrespect it, read the rest before you download it.

This series are ReEncoded using next-generation video format/codec x265. it's one of the best and more advanced than current popular format x264. It also named HEVC which stands for High-Efficient Video Codec.
if you want to play this smoothly, you need to use a device/PC with at least dual-core processor. 
You have to update your player to latest version. Also if you use your PC to watch it, installing LAV Filter will help you a lot if you want to use KMPlayer or PotPlayer. Many players have native support for the codec, live MPC-HC(free) or PowerDVD 14(paid).
Anyway, there's a video samples so you can download, check the quality and check if you can play it or not. it's very easy though. believe me, this format will be so popular in one or two years so you have to deal with it anyway. 

If you ever download this, let me know about the results of your satisfaction. If it will be sucsessful, I will do other TV-shows in this format.

This release DOES have best English Subtitle I could find and it DOES NOT have commentary tracks.

I don't see any more info needed here. just check the sample, if you like it, download the rest and enjoy. I watched the whole series before I release it to be assured there's nothing wrong with it. you can't find any other release of the series with this quality in this size range. 

I wish I could have included some extra,gag reel, etc. but I couldn't find any good source for it. if you know a good source for these stuff, tell me and I will post them in a different release.

Download LAV Filters: <a href="
https://github.com/Nevcairiel/LAVFilters/releases" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://github.com/Nevcairiel/LAVFilters/releases</a>

MPC-HC: <a href="
http://mpc-hc.org/downloads/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://mpc-hc.org/downloads/</a>
